input.content: Answer the following question as concisely as possible.

From the following list of country names, how many countries start with the letter A ?: 1. Australia
2. Canada
3. Mexico
4. France
5. Brazil
6. South Africa
7. Japan
8. Egypt
9. Finland
10. Argentina
11. Vietnam
12. India
13. Switzerland
14. Iceland
15. Nigeria
16. South Korea
17. New Zealand
18. Poland
19. Morocco
20. Portugal
